{{nowrap|[[Laurette Spang-McCook|Laurette Spang]] (1980-Present)}} }} '''John McCook''' (born June 20, 1944) is an American actor best known for his roles on daytime [[soap opera]]s. ==Career== Since 1987, he has played the role of [[Eric Forrester]] on ''[[The Bold and the Beautiful]]''. From 1976 to February 1980, he portrayed the character of Lance Prentiss on ''[[The Young and the Restless]]''. In addition, he has appeared as a guest in episodes on dozens of primetime series. ''B&B'' co-star [[Winsor Harmon]] once starred with McCook on an episode of ''[[Acapulco H.E.A.T.]]'' filmed in [[Mexico]].{{cite news | title = Relatively Speaking | publisher = ''Soap Opera Digest'' | author= Owens, Devin | url = http://www.soapoperadigest.com/features/bb/interviews/mccookharmon/ | accessdate = 2007-09-10 }} Harmon told ''[[Soap Opera Digest]]'' about their guest stint on ''H.E.A.T.'':
"I hung out with John McCook the whole time and I kept watching all these people from other countries asking for his autograph. I'm thinking to myself, 'Who the hell is this guy?' So one night, we were drinking [[Corona (beer)|Coronas]] and I asked him why he had so many fans and he explained how ''[[The Bold and the Beautiful|B&B]]'' was so popular around the world. I had no idea. The more he talked about it, the more I was thinking, 'I want to be on that show.'... The first time I drove into the parking lot, there was John, just pointing at me and laughing. He asked what I was doing here and I told him that I was [[Thorne Forrester|Thorne]]. That's when he told me that he was going to be playing my dad. That was just too wild."''Soap Opera Digest Insider'', September 6, 2007
==Personal life== John McCook has been married since 1980 to former actress [[Laurette Spang-McCook|Laurette Spang]],{{Citation needed|date=May 2010}} by whom he has three children, Jake Thomas (born 1981), Rebecca Jeanne (born 1983), and Molly Jane (born 1990). He was married twice previously, including to the now deceased dancer/actress [[Juliet Prowse]] (1972â79, by whom he had one son, Seth, who was born in 1972).
